Package glac

Class HMM

java.lang.Object
glac.HMM
public class HMM extends Object
A Hidden Markov Model used to describe the trajectory tracking.
We can provide phase observations to achieve tracking.
用于描述轨迹追踪的隐马尔可夫模型，通过向其提供相位观测来实现追踪。
